content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you, Bo Li. The apartment is a beautiful 25 square meter space that is perfect for a young professional or a couple looking for a cozy home. I'm sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price that works for both of us. Let's start with an offer of 800 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Great! I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. The apartment is in a prime location with easy access to transportation, shops, and restaurants. The 700 Euros per month rental price is competitive and reflects the value of the apartment. I'm confident that you will enjoy your time in Mannheim and that this apartment will be a great home for you. Let's sign the lease agreement and get started!
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month.
TERMINATE.
Thank you for your time.
I'll be in touch if I have any other questions.
Goodbye.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can help you with.

Hello
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello! Thank you for letting me know. I understand that you are no longer interested in renting the apartment for 650 Euros per month. If you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can help you with, please don't hesitate to ask. I'm here to assist you in any way I can.
name: Heinrich Heine
